name: Space Shooter (itch) (Alythea)
description:
A space shooter game on unreal made it in about 6 hour just wanted to see what I was capable of making I think it turned out alright  has some mechanics I would re-use , enemies would be scrapped doe since I don't like the way I made them.

Also known bug is if you die the game won't restart itself so your gonna end the game with task manager or alt + f4 since seems like all functionality just stop working.

WASD - Movement
Hold Spacebar - Shoot
Escape - Closes the game
